name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-adhoccalls-transcript-recording-nodejs
title: AdhocCalls for group call recording, transcription, and displaying results in UI.
shortDescription: Use adhocCalls to record/transcribe group calls, send notifications, and show results.
longDescription: This sample uses adhocCalls to create a subscription for recording and transcription. After joining a group call in a group chat, it starts the recording or transcription. When the group call ends or you leave, it triggers notifications, retrieves the recording and transcription details, and displays them in the UI.
